name: Feed Me Tears
description:
Beckon Minions as a hand with legs and bring them towards your body, using their tears to repair your strength and rise from the ground to rule the land again.

Controls:
Xbox 360 Controller controls ingame

ESCAPE to pause, you can censor finger in PG mode from this menu and quit the game.

PC Controls:
WASD to move
LEFT click to beckon
RIGHT click to make the minions cry
